name: The Vessel
description: Don't get too close to the Vessel. There's more inside than just stuffing in this cute, smiling doll. Inside it's paws are razor sharp claws. Within it's barely held together seams lurks a hostile void creature. It's always hungry ... growling noises can be heard all hours of the night. Is it coming from it's voice, or it's stomach? No one's lived to answer that question. They all got too close and got consumed, adding another soul to the void ...
